mapper.sql: a.AllocateId as "allocateId", a.MoDId as "moDId", a.sortseq as "sortseq", a.IssQty as "issQty", a.InvCode as "invCode", a.cinvname as "cinvname", a.cinvstd as "cinvstd", a.ProductType as "productType", a.BaseQtyN as "baseQtyN", a.BaseQtyD as "baseQtyD", a.ChangeRate as "changeRate", a.AuxBaseQtyN as "auxBaseQtyN", a.cComUnitCode as "cComUnitCode", a.cComUnitName as "cComUnitName", a.Remark as "remark", a.qty as "qty"
